thread.title: Chihuly Garden and Glass to Offer an Assortment of Fall Programming
thread.title_full: Chihuly Garden and Glass to Offer an Assortment of Fall Programming - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Chihuly Garden and Glass to Offer an Assortment of Fall Programming
text:
Chihuly Garden and Glass
Introducing Specialty Tours, Bringing Back Local Favorites including Wake up with Yoga
SEATTLE , Sept. 10, Starting in early October, Chihuly Garden and Glass will bring back a series of programs designed to enhance the guest experience and attract new, local audiences. It will also introduce Specialty Tours, featuring revised content and running three times per day, Monday through Friday.
Fall programming includes:
Wake up with Yoga : 10/3, 11/7, 12/5; 9 a.m.
Instructors from Core Power Yoga will teach 60-minute classes in the Glasshouse. The centerpiece of Chihuly Garden and Glass, a 40-foot tall, glass and steel structure covering 4,500 square feet of light-filled space, the Glasshouse is the result of Chihuly's lifelong appreciation for conservatories. Walk with the Gardener : 10/8, 11/5, 12/17; 9:30 a.m.
With the distinction of being the first natural environment created specifically to showcase a Chihuly exhibition, the Garden at Chihuly Garden and Glass offers a special look at the interaction of plants and the artist's work. Join us for a private, pre-open garden tour and Q&A with the Chihuly Garden and Glass gardening team. In this 60-minute experience, we will share our overall landscaping design and philosophy, walk you through our winter and spring plantings, review our master plant list and offer some home gardening tips. Chihuly through the Lens : 10/24, 11/11, 12/19; 9 a.m.
The most comprehensive collection of Chihuly's artwork on public view, a visit to Chihuly Garden and Glass often leaves guests thinking about color, art, and the act of creation in a new way. We invite you to channel that inspiration through the lens in a two-hour, early access photo session. For this special session only, photographers of all levels can bring tripods (no lights, please) and take advantage of unobstructed views of the installations. Specialty Tours and Gallery Talks : Tours: Mon.-Fri.; Gallery Talks: daily
Exhibition Hosts will lead a series of themed tours focused around new and updated content. Gallery Talks will occur in between tours on Mon.-Fri. and hourly on Sat. and Sun. Gallery Talks will rotate through the galleries, highlighting various features for an in-depth viewing experience. Attendees for all programs except Specialty Tours and Gallery Talks must sign up in advance online. All programs are included with standard admission prices and offer access to the exhibition's Galleries and Glasshouse. Chihuly Garden and Glass' membership program, which features unlimited entrance and an invitation to Dale Chihuly's Boathouse, also includes free admission to all programming activities. More information about membership is available at http://www.chihulygardenandglass.com/visit/membership .
For more information and to register for programs, please visit www.chihulygardenandglass.com .
About Chihuly Garden and Glass
Opened May 21, 2012 , Chihuly Garden and Glass, brings together all the elements of Chihuly's work, including Drawings, signature glass series, large architectural installations and personal collections in a long-term exhibition.
Information:
Rose Woodbury , 206-905-2166
pr@chihulygardenandglass.com
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/chihuly-garden-and-glass-to-offer-an-assortment-of-fall-programming-300140965.html
